channel.title: Thrashie - Mafia
channel.description:
Unfortunately the album must be delayed, but I am not done with producing. In fact these collab experiences have made me grow as an artist, and I wouldn’t of went back and changed a thing because I would of never made these advances otherwise so I thank everyone who agreed to collab with me even though some may no longer be interested to finish due to the time it’s been, and the sheer unprofessionalizm of my decisions in the production of the album. I am not saying the album is canceled, I’m saying it is pulled back to let whoever is still interested in finishing songs deal with what they have to do irl, and also not to have strict scheduling hinder my and others progress. That out of the way, I would like to continue production of singles for now, and this is the song I created to show. So I hope you guys enjoy.
https://soundcloud.com/rainbrothrash/mafia![image|499x500](upload://eJMQVaFG6Zc1DMvOl3fVjWg17Q0.jpeg)

item.title: Thrashie - Mafia
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Did I ever mention, when working with you on our songs, that you maaaaaybe use waaaay too many external samples? xD

This guy had at least 5 full drum kits but only had a grand total of 14 external samples used. Half the kits were practically empty too.

I still loved working with it though ;3

Read full topic

item.title: Thrashie - Mafia

item.description:
Ah man well, looking forward to it but of course the appetite will be satiated by this stuff keep em coming !

so it will be some time getting it set up.

item.title: Thrashie - Mafia
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
As per usual, you do not disappoint - production on point, sample selection is excellent and scary in a good way. I’m still not really sure how you mangle this sound out of Auxy, it’s heavy as hell. Did you also say you’re in a band? I’d love to hear what that’s like too if you can/don’t mind linking.

EDIT: Liked and reposted

Read full topic
